metadata.title: CVE-2022-35016 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.3-1ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> included in commits listed in CVE-2022-35014

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3-1ubuntu0.22.10.1').
